articles.author: Samantha Mathewson
articles.title: Hubble Space Telescope captures the soft glow of a distant galaxy (photo) - Space.com
articles.description: European Space Agency officials call it a "ghostly assemblage of stars."
articles.content:
A distant galaxy sparkles from the soft glow of its many tiny stars in a new photo from the Hubble Space Telescope
. 
The galaxy, named ESO 300-16, is located about 28.7 million light-years away fr… [+1830 chars]
